parent_disease: Autosomal recessive severe congenital neutropenia type 4
reasoning: Extremely rare genetic disorder caused by G6PC3 mutations. Now classified as severe congenital neutropenia type 4 with pulmonary hypertension. Prevalence and incidence data are not well established. Only handful of cases reported in medical literature since 2009. Insufficient epidemiological data to estimate incidence or prevalence.
source: Orphanet database, Banka et al. (2010) American Journal of Medical Genetics
